<title level="1" right="Action">[Cleanse Soul Path](/Actions.aspx?ID=774) <actions string="" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Exploration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=66" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 234 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You meditate, pray, or otherwise try to reinforce your soul's connection to your [soulforged armament](/Rules.aspx?ID=1561). This takes 10 minutes. Attempt a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) check against your [_soulforged corruption_](/Rules.aspx?ID=1563). The counteract level is half your level rounded up, and the counteract check modifier is your [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) modifier. If successful, reduce the stage of your _soulforged corruption_ by 1 (to a minimum of Stage 1).
name: Cleanse Soul Path
